channel.title: Leafony – Reference Manual
channel.description: Recent content in Reference Manual on Leafony

item.title: Docs: Leafony bus
item.description:
Leafony bus の仕様

Leafony busは、複数のリーフが電気信号および電源接続を行う共通経路部。リーフの相互接続を可能にするために、Leafony busは、リーフの20mm x 5.5mm領域の電気的及び、物理的な仕様が定められています。

ピンアウト

コネクタ形状

  • 基板の厚さは、t=0.8。パッド部分は、金めっき。レイアウト図のデータは（dxf、、KiCad、EAGLE)は、AX02A 29pin を参照願います。

コネクタの取り付け・取り外し

リーフ基板にコネクタを取り付ける、または、外す場合は下図のように行ってください。

  • 取り付け

  • 取り外し

コネクタの試験結果

AX61Aコネクタ仕様書を参考

接続不良時の対処

Connectorや基板の接点に汚れが付着すると、接続不良が生じることがあります。その場合、無水エタノールを含ませた紙製ウエスで払拭してください。それでも改善しない場合は、Connectorを交換してください。

ライセンス

  • Leafony busのアートワークの著作者は、Leafony Systems 社です。ライセンスは、 表示 4.0 国際(CC BY 4.0) で、提供されています。なお、著作権表示や無保証を参照する表示は、ありません。Leafony bus以外は、Leafony Systems社は、著作権を主張することはありません。
  • Leafony busのアートワークをコピーして、使用する場合は、「この製品の一部は、Leafony SystemsによるLeafony busのアートワークを利用しています。」と表示をお願いします。

item.title: Docs: AI01A 4-Sensors
item.description:
Features

This is a leaf equipped with a temperature/humidity sensor, an illuminance sensor, and an acceleration sensor, which is connected to the MCU leaf via I2C.

Specification

Item Description
Temperature and humidity sensor
Temperature measurement range -40～120℃
Temperature accuracy ±0.5°C (15 to +40°C)
Relative humidity range 0 to 100%
Humidity accuracy 3.5% rH (20 to +80% rH)
Interfaces I2C
Illuminance sensor
Measurement range 0.01 lux to 83 k lux
IR Rejects > 99% (typ)
Interfaces I2C
Accelerometer
Measurement range ±2g/±4g/±8g/±16g (selectable)
Function 6D/4D orientation detection
Freefall detection
Motion detection
Interfaces I2C

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample project

  • LED点滅

Library(An overview of the function is provided in the specification.）

  • Unified Sensor Driver include file: Adafruit_Sensor.h
  • Temperature and humidity sensor data acquisition include file: HTS221.h
  • Illuminance sensor data acquisition include file: ClosedCube_OPT3001.h
  • Acceleration sensor data acquisition include file : Adafruit_LIS3DH.h※
    ※：If you use it as it is, it will be a write error. Please see here to edit it.

See How to compensate for temperature (or humidity) and edit it.

If there is a difference between the temperature (or humidity) to be displayed and the temperature (or humidity) of 4-Sensors, two-point correction will be made.Click here for details.

Document

  • Spec sheet
  • Schematic
  • Component marking
  • PCBLayout Zuken
  • PCBLayout dxf

item.title: Docs: AP01A AVR MCU
item.description:
Features

Leaf with ATmega328P, with 14 digital input and output pins (six of which can be used as PWM outputs), six analog input pins, an 8 MHz oscillator, and a reset button. If you want to connect to USB, connect USB. If you want to use ICSP, connect Shield. When using Arduino IDE, Arduino Pro or Pro Mini board and ATmega328P(3.3V,8MHz) processor are selected.

Specification

Item Description
MCU ATmega328P
Operating voltage 3.3V
Operating voltage range 1.5-5V
Digital I/O 14
Analog input 6
Flash memory 32 KB
SRAM 2KB
EEPROM 1KB
Operating frequency 8MHz

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample Project

  • LED blink

Library

・An overview of the function is provided in the specification
・Timer interrupt　include file: MsTimer2.h
　The following are Standard Libraries, which are stored in C:\Program Files (x86)\Arduino\libraries when you install the IDE.
・Software serial communication　include file: SoftwareSerial.h
・I2C communication　include file: Wire.h
・Watchdog timer　include file: avr/wdt.h
・Sleep mode　include file: avr/sleep.h

Document

  • Spec Sheet
  • Schematic
  • Component Marking
  • PCBLayout(Zuken)
  • PCBLayout(dxf)
  • Bootloaders

item.title: Docs: AC03A LoRa Easy
item.description:
Features

Leaf equipped with EASEL’s technically certified LoRa module ES920LRA1, which is connected to the MCU leaf via UART.

Specification

Item Description
SoC MKL16Z128 (ARM Cortex-M0+)
RF Transceiver SX1276 (SEMTECH)
Frequency range 920.6～928.0MHz
Transmission speed 146bps～22kbps
RX sensitivity -118～-142dBm
TX power 13dBm（20mW)以下
RF certification TELEC
Approximate communication distance (wire antenna) Prospect 5km
Flash 128KB
RAM 32KB
Interfaces UART

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample Project

  • Display the value of the sensor using LoRa Leaf

Document

  • [Spec Sheet]
  • Schematic
  • Component Marking
  • PCBLayout(Zuken)
  • PCBLayout(dxf)

item.title: Docs: AI02A SP&PIR
item.description:
Features

The Leaf is equipped with a piezoelectric speaker and a human-detecting sensor. The piezoelectric speaker is connected to the MCU leaf by PWM and the human-detecting sensor by I2C. The human-detecting sensor has a built-in proximity detection algorithm that can detect proximity with simple settings, and can output an interrupt signal when proximity is detected.

Specification

Item Description
Piezoelectric speaker
dimensions 12 x 12 x 3mm
rated frequency 4kHz(typ)
sound pressure level 81dB(min) at 10 cm, 5 Vp-p, 4,000 Hz square wave
Current consumption 5mA(max) at 5 Vp-p, 4,000 Hz square wave
human-detecting sensor
Sensor Quantum-type IR Sensor
Integrated digital filters Cut-off Frequency 0.9Hz,0.445Hz *Only with 10Hz of Data Output Rate(ODR)
Interfaces I2C

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample project

  • LED点滅

Document

  • Spec sheet
  • Schematic SP&PIR
  • Schematic PIR
  • Component marking
  • PCBLayout SP＆PIR (Zuken)
  • PCBLayout PIR (Zuken)
  • PCBLayout SP＆PIR (dxf)
  • PCBLayout PIR (dxf)

item.title: Docs: AP02A ESP32 MCU
item.description:
Features

It’s a 32-bit MCU leaf with Espressif Systems’ Xtensa Dual-Core 32-bit LX6 microprocessor, ESP32-WROOM-32 with integrated technically certified Wi-Fi and BLE. Wireless is certified FCC, CE-RED, IC, TELEC, KCC, SRRC, and NCC (Espressif Systems Data Sheet V2.9). It can be used as a VBUS (5V) power supply by supplying USB power.

Specification

Item Description
SoC ESP32-D0WDQ6 (CPU:Xtensa LX6)
Operating voltage 3.3V
Operating voltage range 2.2-3.6V
Digital I/O 14
Analog input 6
TouchSensor I/F 6
Flash Memory 4 MB
SRAM 520 KB
Operating frequency 80M-240MHz
Wi-Fi protocols IEEE 802.11b/g/n
Bluetooth protocols Bluetooth v4.2 BR/EDR and BLE specification
RF certification FCC/CE-RED/IC/TELEC/KCC/SRRC/NCC

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample Project

  • Using Wi-Fi to display the value of the touch sensor　※リンク先 要変更

Document

  • Spec Sheet
  • Schematic
  • Component Marking
  • PCBLayout(Zuken)
  • PCBLayout(dxf)

Software

item.title: Docs: AC02A BLE Sugar
item.description:
Features

This leaf is equipped with a BGM11S22F256GA-V2 technically certified BLE module from Silicon Labs and is connected to the MCU leaf via UART. The wireless has been certified by CE, FCC, ISED Canada, TELEC, KC South-Korea, and NCC Taiwan (SLICON LABS Module Data Sheet Revision 1.2).

Specification

Item　　　　　　　 Description
SoC EFR32BG1 (ARM Cortex-M4)
Bluetooth version 4.2
Frequency range 2400M ~ 2483.5MHz
Internet security General Purpose CRC
Random Number Generator
Hardware Cryptographic Acceleration for AES 128/256,SHA-1, SHA-2 (SHA-224 and SHA-256) and ECC
RX sensitivity -90 dBm @ 1 Mbit/s GFSK
TX power +8dBm以下
RF certification CE, full FCC, ISED Canada, Japan and South-Korea
Flash 256KB
RAM 32KB
Interfaces UART

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample Project

  • Use Web Bluetooth to display sensor values ※リンク先要変更

Library

・An overview of the function is provided in the specification
・BLE control　include file: TBGLib

Document

  • Spec Sheet
  • Schematic
  • Component Marking
  • PCBLayout(Zuken)
  • PCBLayout(dxf)

item.title: Docs: AI03A MIC&VR&LED
item.description:
Features

MEMS microphone, volume and LED are connected to the MCU LEAF with analog input pin for MEMS microphone and volume and digital output pin for LED. In order to achieve low power consumption, it is possible to turn off the power supply with a load switch by controlling the I2C Expander.

Specification

Item Description
Microphone
Type MEMS
Direction Omnidirectional
Frequency range 100Hz ～ 10kHz
Gain 0dB
Interfaces Interfaces
Volume
Nominal resistance 10kΩ
Resistance law Linear law (B)
Effective electrical angle 210° (1 turn)
LED
Package type Side-view
Emitting color Yellow

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample project

  • LED点滅

Document

  • Spec sheet
  • Schematic
  • Component marking
  • PCBLayout Zuken
  • PCBLayout dxf

item.title: Docs: AI04A LCD
item.description:
Features

The LCD unit is connected to the MCU leaf via I2C. The switch is connected to the digital input pin of the MCU and the P1 pin of the I2C Expander. The power supply can be turned off with a load switch by controlling the I2C Expander in order to achieve low power consumption.

Specification

Item Description
Display format 8x2 Character
Viewing area (WxH) 27x10.5mm
Dot size (WxH) 0.45x0.5mm
Dot pitch (WxH) 0.5x0.55mm
Character size (WxH) 2.45x4.35mm
Character pitch (WxH) 2.95x4.9mm
Viewing direction 6:00 O’Clock
Driving method 1/16Duty,1/5Bias
Controller IC ST7032I-0D(Sitronix) or compatible
Display mode STN (Gray)/Positive/Reflective
Interfaces I2C

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample project

  • LED点滅

Library

  • An overview of the function is provided in the specification.
  • Control of LCD include file: ST7032.h

Document

  • Spec sheet
  • Schematic
  • Component marking
  • PCBLayout Zuken
  • PCBLayout dxf

item.title: Docs: AV01A CR2032
item.description:
Features

This product has a CR2032 coin cell holder, which converts 3V battery voltage to 3.3V with a step-up power supply circuit, and supplies 3.3V to each leaf. In addition, an AD converter to monitor the battery voltage is implemented.

Specification

Item Description
Battery voltage 0.7～3.8V
Output voltage 3.3V±2%
Control method PWM/PFM Automatic switching control
Maximum output current 300mA @3.3V to 5V
Protection circuit Overcurrent limit / Thermal shutdown
Resolution 8bit
Reference voltage Vdd(3.3V)
Sample rate 188.9kSPS(max)
Interfaces I2C

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample Project

  • Display the battery voltage on the computer ※リンク先要変更

Document

  • Spec Sheet
  • Schematic
  • Component Marking
  • PCBLayout(Zuken)
  • PCBLayout(dxf)

item.title: Docs: AV02A CR2450
item.description:
Features

A CR2450 coin cell holder is mounted, and 3.3V battery voltage is converted to 3.3V by a step-up power supply circuit, and 3.3V is supplied to each leaf, and a switch to turn on/off 3.3V is mounted. In addition, an AD converter to monitor the battery voltage is implemented.

Specification

Item Description
Battery voltage 0.7～3.8V
Output voltage 3.3V±2%
Control method PWM/PFM Automatic switching control
Maximum output current 300mA @3.3V to 5V
Protection circuit Overcurrent limit / thermal shutdown
Resolution 8bit
Reference voltage Vdd(3.3V)
Sample rate 188.9kSPS(max)
Interfaces I2C

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample Project

  • Display the battery voltage on the computer ※リンク先要変更

item.title: Docs: AV04A 2V～4.5V
item.description:
Features

A switch to turn on/off the 3.3V is mounted. In addition, an AD converter to monitor the battery voltage is implemented. Two to three dry cell batteries or Li-Po and Li-ION batteries are assumed to be connectable to the SH connector.

Specification　

Item Description
Battery voltage 1.8～5.5V
Output voltage 3.3V±2%
Control method PWM/PFM Automatic switching control
Maximum output current 300mA (at the time of the buck)
Protection circuit Overcurrent limit / thermal shutdown
Resolution 8bit
Reference voltage Vdd(3.3V)
Sample rate 188.9kSPS(max)
Interfaces I2C

Block diagram

Sample Project

  • Display the battery voltage on the computer ※リンク先要変更

Data from KiCad and EAGLE

The data from KiCad and EAGLE, which are used by many individuals, were converted from Zuken’s CAD data, so the possibility of a conversion error cannot be ruled out. Please check the dimensions of the product before using it.

This leaf is used to connect a leaf with all the leaf I/F terminals connected to the side.

item.title: Docs: AX04A Spacer
item.description:
Features

This leaf is used to connect another leaf on top of a leaf that uses a component that is at least 2mm high with all the leaf I/F terminals connected.

Document

item.title: Docs: AX05A I Meas
item.description:
Features

This leaf can measure the current consumption of 3.3V and VBUS. Since the pads of 3.3V and VBUS are electrically separated from the front and back side of the current measuring leaf, it is possible to measure all power supply currents of single or multiple leafs located far from the battery leaf by connecting a current meter to each of the following through holes. In the example below, the sensor leaf and the BLE leaf are placed on the far side of the battery leaf through the current measurement leaf, so the total current of both leaves can be measured.

Document

  • Spec sheet
  • Schematic
  • Component marking
  • PCBLayout Zuken
  • PCBLayout dxf

item.title: Docs: AX06A Grove&5V
item.description:
Features

It is a leaf capable of UART, I2C, analog input, and digital input that operates at 5V and complies with Seeed Studio’s Grove series. 3.3V is converted to 5V by a step-up power supply circuit and supplied to Grove. In order to achieve low power consumption, it is possible to turn off the 5V power supply by controlling the I2C Expander.

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample project

  • LED点滅

Document

  • Schematic
  • Component marking
  • PCBLayout Zuken
  • PCBLayout dxf

item.description:

This leaf is used to invert and connect the leafs to which all the leaf I/F terminals are connected.

item.title: Docs: AZ61A Connector
item.description:
Features

The Leafony Platform uses ACR (Anisotropic Conductive Rubber), which is an insulating silicone rubber with a narrowly pitched array of metal or conductive elastomeric conductive members that are compressed to create an electrical connection.

Document

  • [Spec Sheet]

item.title: Docs: AZ01A USB
item.description:
Features

The FTDI FT232RQ is a USB to UART conversion IC that converts USB VBUS (5V) to 3.3V with a step-down power supply circuit, and supplies VBUS and 3.3V to each leaf.

Specification

Item Description
USB USB 2.0 Full speed 　
Data transfer rates 300 baud to 3 Mbaud
power supply
Output voltage 3.3V±2%
Control method　 PWM/PFM Automatic switching control
Maximum output current 500mA
Protection circuit Overcurrent limiting / thermal shutdown/short-circuit protection

Block diagram

Pinassign

Document

  • Spec Sheet
  • Schematic
  • Component Marking
  • PCBLayout(Zuken)
  • PCBLayout(dxf)

item.title: Docs: AZ62A Connector Cover
item.description:
Features

The Connector Cover can protect against dust on ACR (Anisotropic Conductive Rubber).

Hardware

  • Outline Drawing

item.title: Docs: AZ02A RTC&MicroSD
item.description:
Features

Leaf with NXP’s Real-Time Clock PCF8523TK and Micro SD card slot, the RTC can output interrupt signals to the MCU via alarms and timers, and the micro SD card can be accessed via SPI.

Specification　

Item Description
RTC
Type Real-Time Clock (RTC) and calendar
Interrupt Alarm and timer
Used crystal unit FC-12M 32.768000kHz 7.0 +20.0-20.0
Interfaces I2C

Block diagram

Pinassign

Sample Project

  • Using Wi-Fi to display the value of the touch sensor　※リンク先 要変更
  • Display the time on your computer ※リンク先要変更
  • Displaying microSD card information on a computer ※リンク先要変更
  • Save images taken with the camera to a microSD card ※リンク先要変更

Library

・An overview of the function is provided in the specification
・RTC control　include file: RTClib.h
　The following are the Standard Libraries.
　When you install the IDE, it’s stored in C:\Program Files (x86)\Arduino\libraries . ・SD card control　include:SD.h
　　　　　　　　　 include:spi.h

Document

  • Spec Sheet
  • Schematic
  • Component Marking
  • PCBLayout(Zuken)
  • PCBLayout(dxf)

item.title: Docs: AZ63A Nut Plate
item.description:
Features

The Nut Plate is used to secure the leaf with a screw. If a commercially available hexagonal nut is used, it may touch the electrodes on the board and cause a short circuit, so be careful.

Hardware
